Associate professor at the Faculty of Pharmacy at ULB in Brussels, in analytical chemistry and biological therapeutics. I’m specialized in metabolomics based on LC-MS(/MS) but also un glycosylation analysis of glycoproteins, including pharmaceutical biotherapeutics.

## Education

**Master degree** in Pharmacy in 2008 (ULB, Belgium)

**Ph D** in Pharmaceutical Sciences in 2012 (ULB, Belgium)

## Experience

**ULB** PhD on posttranslational modification analysis by LC-MSMS in Brussels, Faculty of Pharmacy, (2008-2012).

**NIBRT** in Dublin, Postdoc on glycomics (2012-2013).

**ULB** postdoc on glycomics in Brussels, Faculty of Pharmacy (2013-2017.)

**Lille** postdoc on glycomics (2014).

**ULB** premier assistant (2017-2022) and then associate professor (2022- now), at ULB, Phaculty of Pharmacy.
